name: heart amigurumi
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
in the run-up to valentine's day i wanted to share with you a little heart.

it's a last minute-gift, that can also be perfect to use your scraps of yarn. it takes about 5 to 10 minutes to make it.

then you will be able to spread the love with your makes! 

**you will need:**  

* basics such as scissors, stitch marker, stuffing, sewing needle.
* choose a yarn and the appropriate hook size.

**pale yellow heart version:**
--------------------------

* maxi sugar rush (50g/280m - 100%
  mercerized cotton), color 101-candle
  light.
* 1.50 mm hook

**purple heart version**:
---------------------

* catona denim (50g/125m - 100% cotton),
  color sch-136 purple.
* 2.50 mm hook

**pink heart version:**
-------------------

* colour crafter (100g/300m - 100% premium acrylic), color 1130 sittard.
* 3.50 mm hook


have fun and enjoy !

ps: don't forget to link a project and add pictures, it will be my pleasure to share your makes on my blog :slightly_smiling_face: 

magali
